stanza.line: When I have seen by Time fell hand defaceddefaced
The rich-proud cost of outworn buried ageage
When sometime lofty towers I see down-raseddown-rased
And brass eternal slave to mortal ragerage
When I have seen the hungry ocean gaingain
Advantage on the kingdom of the shoreshore
And the firm soil win of the watery mainmain
Increasing store with loss and loss with storestore
When I have seen such interchange of StateState
Or state it self confounded to decaydecay
Ruin hath taught me thus to ruminateruminate
That Time will come and take my love awayaway
This thought is as a death which cannot choosechoose
But weep to have that which it fears to loselose
